name: Trump! Jump
summary: Help a poorly drawn comical rendition of President Trump navigate his political obstacles, such as a terrible rendition of Hillary Clinton's face, a Hillary 2016 arrow, protests, the FBI, and more. Whether you like President Trump or, dislike him, this game will amuse you while waiting for the train, elevator, or other irritator of your impatience, or play while you are otherwise occupied to help relax you and pass the time.
